channel.title: CVE Feed for Farmakom -- Remote Administration Console
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Farmakom -- Remote Administration Console

item.title: CVE-2023-3717|2023-08-08T10:46:36.651Z -- farmakom -- remote%20administration%20console
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Farmakom Remote Administration Console allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Remote Administration Console: before 1.02.
